mission.label: Our Mission
mission.heading: Empowering small businesses with simple, powerful tools to sell smarter and grow faster
mission.description: Ratio tuta is your all-in-one point-of-sale and business management platform. Track sales, manage inventory, and gain insights across all your locations — without the complexity or cost of traditional POS systems.

saveTime.title: Save time on daily operations:
saveTime.body: Automate inventory tracking, generate instant receipts, and eliminate manual counting. Spend less time on paperwork and more time growing your business.

saveMoney.title: Keep more of what you earn:
saveMoney.body: No expensive hardware, no hidden fees. Track profit margins in real-time, identify your best sellers, and reduce waste from overstocking or spoilage.

stayUpdated.title: Stay in control, anywhere:
stayUpdated.body: Monitor sales, inventory, and performance across multiple locations from any device. Get real-time alerts when stock runs low or when you hit sales milestones.

beSecure.title: Your data, protected:
beSecure.body: Bank-level encryption keeps your business data safe. Role-based permissions ensure team members only see what they need. Complete audit trails track every transaction.

liveVisibility.title: Real-time insights
liveVisibility.desc: Live sales & inventory across all locations

hero.badge: Private by default · Role-based access · Audit trail
hero.title: A secure online notebook that does the math for you
hero.subtitle: Write, structure, and calculate in one place. Keep sensitive data protected, collaborate safely, and let formulas handle the numbers.

howItWorks.subtitle: Get your business up and running in just 5 simple steps. From signup to tracking sales, we've got you covered.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.description: Learn how to use Ratio tuta effectively

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Quick start guide for new users

content.intro: Welcome to Ratio tuta! This guide will help you get started with your secure online notebook.
content.step1: Sign up with your email and verify your account. You'll receive a verification link in your inbox.
content.step2: Places help you organize different locations or departments. Go to Dashboard → Home → Create Place to add your first location.
content.step3: Invite teammates from Dashboard → Team. Assign roles (Admin, Member, User) based on their responsibilities.
content.step4: Add items to your catalog from Dashboard → Items. You can create individual items or use boxes for multiple variants.
content.step5: Open the cash register for your place and start recording transactions. All data is automatically synced and secured.

places.title: Managing Places
places.description: How to create and manage your locations

content.intro: Places represent physical locations or departments in your organization. Each place has its own inventory, team members, and sales data.
content.creating: To create a place, go to Dashboard → Home and click 'Create Place'. Fill in the name, address, timezone, and currency.
content.assigning: Assign items to places by opening a place and going to the Items tab. You can control quantities for each location.
content.members: Add team members to specific places to control access. Members can only see places they're assigned to.

content.intro: Ratio tuta provides powerful inventory management with support for different measurement types, categories, and variants.
content.items: Create individual items with prices, costs, tax rates, and stock levels. Items are team-wide and can be assigned to multiple places.
content.boxes: Boxes let you create multiple size variants at once. Perfect for clothing, shoes, or any items with size variations.
content.categories: Organize items into categories for easier navigation and reporting.
content.stock: Track stock levels automatically. The system updates quantities as sales are made.

content.intro: The cash register is optimized for fast, easy transactions on any device.
content.selecting: Browse items by category or search by name. Click an item to add it to the cart.
content.variants: For items with variants (sizes), select the variant before adding to cart.
content.payment: Choose payment method (Cash or Card). For cash payments, enter the amount given to calculate change.
content.receipts: All receipts are automatically saved and viewable in Documents section.

content.intro: View sales analytics, earnings, and performance metrics from the Reports section.
content.overview: See total earnings, average ticket size, items sold, and trends over time.
content.filtering: Filter by date range, place, payment method, or category.
content.exporting: Export data for further analysis in spreadsheet applications.

content.intro: Ratio tuta is built with modern web technologies for performance, security, and scalability.
content.frontend: Next.js 15 (App Router), React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
content.backend: Next.js API Routes, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM
content.auth: Custom session-based authentication with secure cookies
content.storage: AWS S3 for images with automatic optimization
content.deployment: Optimized for Vercel deployment with edge functions

content.intro: The application uses PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM for type-safe database access.
content.models: Key models: User, Team, Place, Item, Category, Receipt, PlaceMember, PlaceItem
content.relations: Users belong to teams, places belong to teams, items are assigned to places with quantities.
content.migrations: Use 'npx prisma migrate dev' to create new migrations.

content.intro: All API routes are in /app/api/ directory and use Next.js Route Handlers.
Ratio tuta implements multiple layers of security to protect your data.
content.csrf: CSRF protection on all mutating requests using double-submit cookie pattern.
content.xss: XSS protection through React's built-in escaping and Content Security Policy.
content.sql: SQL injection prevention via Prisma's parameterized queries.
content.sessions: Secure HTTP-only cookies with SameSite=Lax, signed with HMAC-SHA256.
content.rate: Rate limiting on authentication endpoints to prevent brute force attacks.

deployment.title: Deployment Guide
deployment.description: How to deploy your own instance

content.intro: Deploy Ratio tuta to Vercel or any Node.js hosting platform.
content.env: Required environment variables: DATABASE_URL, SESSION_SECRET, AWS_* for S3, SMTP_* for emails.
content.database: Use a PostgreSQL database (Neon, Supabase, or AWS RDS recommended).
content.storage: Configure S3 bucket for image uploads with proper CORS and bucket policies.
content.build: Run 'npm run build' to create production build. Ensure prisma generate runs first.

apiReference.title: API Reference
apiReference.coming: Detailed API documentation coming soon. See Developer Guide → API Routes for now.

content.intro: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities.
content.encryption: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest in the database.
content.access: Role-based access control ensures users only see what they're authorized to access.
content.audit: Comprehensive audit logging tracks all important actions.
content.compliance: Built with privacy-first principles and GDPR considerations.
content.updates: Regular security updates and vulnerability scanning.
